sentence: Too noisy in the lobby and on the floors and not fun to ride an elevator with people reeking of marijuana
Reception told me W exceeds the Hilton Group but failed to elaborate when i asked further
They should also warn you that this place turns into a club at night lack of security with the amount of loud conversations in the wee hours of the night in the hallways and the SLOW elevators
Only 1 elevator worked on Saturday
No Jacuzi Had to call to have gym supplied with water
One elevator door was stuck while another made loud squeaking noises not exactly reassuring for my safety
The room we had was noisy close to elevator
After waiting too long to check in when there was only one person ahead of us we then had to wait an interminably long time for one of the many elevators to arrive
I was not a guest here so I can not comment on rooms amenities

They provided no discounts even though the entrance was a dark tunnel with cardboard walls the lobby was makeshift in the hallway in front of the elevators and virtually all of the common space was closed off to the guests
During my stay everyone in the lobby area was quick with a smile and greeting
love the lobby bar
Good beds amenities great staff
Once you walk in you immediately note that the social and reception areas are well decorated and trendy
I had a couple great bartenders at the Living Room and a nice front desk assistant who let us change rooms after I realized we were too close to the elevator to get good sleep
I loved the Bar in the lobby the hotel and room decor
Nice amenities hotel bar was beautiful
Nice hotel AWESOME live music one night in lobby great spa service was fantastic and the manager Lorraine provided awesome customer service
I had a great experience at this hotel The person that was working at the front lobby area Mr Sean was AWESOME
Great ambiance excellent location and solid amenities
